## MatrixIndexFunction type

A function that generates a matrix entry based on its row index `i` and column index `j`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MatrixIndexFunction<S> = (i: number, j: number) => S;
```

## Remarks

This should be a pure function
